childElements.name: TextBlock10
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12.0, "label" : "TextBlock10", "text" : "

Please upload any additional Supporting Documentation as it relates to your application

We require the following documentation:

  1. Copy of your Canadian citizenship or immigration status in Canada (E.g. Canadian Birth Certificate OR if you were not born in Canada please provide a copy of your most recent immigration document)
  2. Copy of your child’s health card
  3. Copy of MEDICAL documentation that details your child’s disability or diagnosis, signed by a Physician or a Psychologist in Ontario (e.g. Psychological Assessment)
  4. Copy of your Notice of Assessment (showing line 15000) for yourself (if single), or for you & your spouse (if married or in a common-law relationship even if $0 amount)
  5. Copy of 2019 Canada Child Benefit (CCB) Notice for the period July 2020 – June 2021. This document is mailed to you from Canada Revenue Agency in July each year. This document includes the name of your child/children and your marital status
  6. Bank information or a void cheque for direct deposit
", "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }

omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "show" : { "group" : { "operator" : "AND", "rules" : [ { "condition" : "=", "field" : "PassesScreening", "data" : "Yes" } ] } }, "label" : "Estimated Benefits", "validationRequired" : true, "previousLabel" : "Previous", "previousWidth" : 3.0, "nextLabel" : "Next", "nextWidth" : 3.0, "cancelLabel" : "Cancel", "cancelMessage" : "Are you sure?", "saveLabel" : "Save for later", "saveMessage" : "Are you sure you want to save it for later?", "completeLabel" : "Complete", "completeMessage" : "Are you sure you want to complete the script?", "showPersistentComponent" : [ false, false ], "remoteTimeout" : 30000.0, "remoteOptions" : { }, "knowledgeOptions" : { "language" : "English", "publishStatus" : "Online", "keyword" : "", "dataCategoryCriteria" : "", "remoteTimeout" : 30000.0 }, "conditionType" : "Hide if False", "remoteClass" : "", "remoteMethod" : "" }

childElements.name: LineBreak3
TextBlock7
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12.0, "label" : "TextBlock7", "text" : "

Extraordinary Child Care and Babysitting Costs

If the child does not require specialized childcare then no cost will be allowed.

 

Extraordinary Hourly Cost For Specialized Care

If your child with special needs is 12 years of age or older and still requires a babysitter, childcare will be approved at cost.

 

Babysitting Costs

The babysitting for other children in the family, less than 12 years of age, while taking the identified child to a doctor's appointment or meetings relating to the disability may be included.

 

Specialized Day Care

Day care costs may be claimed when integration into a specific program has been recommended by a professional (recommendation and receipts are required).

", "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }

childElements.name: TextBlock9
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "sanitize" : false, "textKey" : "", "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "dataJSON" : false, "text" : "

Transportation, Meals and Accomodation

\n

Transportation and meal costs may be considered when the purpose of the trip is to escort the child to treatment or medical appointments related to the disability. Transportation costs paid to these appointments (e.g. car, bus, train, etc.) are allowable at actual cost. You will be reimbursed at $0.40 per kilometre for the use of a private car. Meals are allowable for the child and parent(s).

\n

Please note that loss of pay as a result of having to take your child for treatment is not an eligible expense.

", "label" : "TextBlock5", "controlWidth" : 12.0 }

childElements.name: ACSD
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "controlWidth" : 12, "label" : "Apply for this Program?", "required" : false, "repeat" : false, "repeatClone" : false, "repeatLimit" : null, "readOnly" : false, "horizontalMode" : "displayWide", "defaultValue" : null, "help" : false, "helpText" : "", "helpTextPos" : "", "options" : [ { "name" : "true", "developerName" : null, "value" : "Yes", "autoAdv" : null }, { "name" : "false", "developerName" : null, "value" : "No", "autoAdv" : null } ], "optionSource" : { "type" : "", "source" : "" }, "controllingField" : { "element" : "", "type" : "", "source" : "" }, "show" : null, "conditionType" : "Hide if False", "accessibleInFutureSteps" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "hide" : false, "optionWidth" : 100, "optionHeight" : 100, "imageCountInRow" : 3, "enableCaption" : true, "disOnTplt" : false }

childElements.name: ACSD-Explanation
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "dataJSON" : false, "text" : "

If you are a parent or guardian who is caring for a child with a severe disability you may be able to get financial support through the Assistance for Children with Severe Disabilities (ACSD) Program. This program provides financial support for low-income and moderate-income families to cover some of the extra costs of caring for a child who has a severe disability.

Eligible parents and guardians can receive between $25 and $500 a month to help with disability-related costs.

 

Eligibility

If you are a parent or a guardian of a child who is under 18 years of age (17 and under), lives at home and who has a severe disability, you may be eligible to receive funding from this program.

Your eligibility and the amount of assistance you receive is based on a combination of factors:

  • your household income
  • size of your family
  • severity of your child’s disability
  • extraordinary costs related to your child’s disability
", "controlWidth" : 12 }

childElements.name: ER
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "controlWidth" : 12, "label" : "Apply for this Program?", "required" : false, "repeat" : false, "repeatClone" : false, "repeatLimit" : null, "readOnly" : false, "horizontalMode" : "displayWide", "defaultValue" : null, "help" : false, "helpText" : "", "helpTextPos" : "", "options" : [ { "name" : "true", "developerName" : null, "value" : "Yes", "autoAdv" : null }, { "name" : "false", "developerName" : null, "value" : "No", "autoAdv" : null } ], "optionSource" : { "type" : "", "source" : "" }, "controllingField" : { "element" : "", "type" : "", "source" : "" }, "show" : null, "conditionType" : "Hide if False", "accessibleInFutureSteps" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "hide" : false, "optionWidth" : 100, "optionHeight" : 100, "imageCountInRow" : 3, "enableCaption" : true, "disOnTplt" : false }

childElements.name: ER-Explanation
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "disOnTplt" : false, "dataJSON" : false, "text" : "

You can receive up to $3,500 per child, per year to spend on respite.

Your family may be eligible for this grant if you are caring for a child who is medically fragile and/or depends on a technological device and requires care 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.

 

Eligibility

To be eligible, your child must:

  • be under 18 years of age
  • live at home
  • need intensive care and constant monitoring on a 24-hour basis
  • be medically fragile and/or technology dependent, meeting one of the following criteria:
    • relies on medical and technological equipment, such as mechanical ventilators, apnea monitors, renal dialysis, urinary catheters, colostomy bags
    • is administered drugs intravenously
    • relies on tracheotomy tube care, suctioning, oxygen support or tube feeding
", "controlWidth" : 12 }

childElements.name: LineBreak5
LineBreak6
SSAH
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "disOnTplt" : false, "enableCaption" : true, "imageCountInRow" : 3, "optionHeight" : 100, "optionWidth" : 100, "hide" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "accessibleInFutureSteps" : false, "conditionType" : "Hide if False", "show" : null, "controllingField" : { "source" : "", "type" : "", "element" : "" }, "optionSource" : { "source" : "", "type" : "" }, "options" : [ { "name" : "true", "developerName" : null, "value" : "Yes", "autoAdv" : null }, { "name" : "false", "developerName" : null, "value" : "No", "autoAdv" : null } ], "helpTextPos" : "", "helpText" : "", "help" : false, "defaultValue" : null, "horizontalMode" : "displayWide", "readOnly" : false, "repeatLimit" : null, "repeatClone" : false, "repeat" : false, "required" : false, "label" : "Apply for this Program?", "controlWidth" : 12 }

childElements.name: SSAH-Explanation
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "dataJSON" : false, "text" : "

Families who are caring for a child with a developmental and/or physical disability can apply to the special services at home program to get funding for primary caregiver relief and related supports or for activities of personal growth or development including camps and recreational activities, like swimming and music classes.

Respite enhances the primary caregiver’s capacity to provide care for the child with a disability living at home through the provision of indirect assistance. Indirect assistance can help provide relief to the primary caregiver so that they may take some time away from caregiving, or from one or more of their other responsibilities such as cooking, housekeeping and grocery shopping.

The amount of funding you receive depends on

  • the type and amount of service your child needs
  • what other help is available in your community
  • what kind of support you already receive

 

Eligibility

You can apply for this support if your child:

  • has a developmental and/or physical disability
  • lives in Ontario
  • is under the age of 18
  • needs more support than you can provide
  • lives at home with you, or is not living at home with you and is not being helped by other residential services
", "controlWidth" : 12 }

childElements.name: TextBlock11
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12, "label" : "TextBlock11", "text" : "

Assistance for Children with Severe Disabilities Program

", "show" : null, "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }

childElements.name: TextBlock12
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "sanitize" : false, "textKey" : "", "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "dataJSON" : false, "show" : null, "text" : "

Special Services at Home Program

", "label" : "TextBlock11", "controlWidth" : 12 }

childElements.name: TextBlock13
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12, "label" : "TextBlock11", "text" : "

Enhanced Respite Program

", "show" : null, "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }

childElements.name: IntensiveCare
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "disOnTplt" : false, "enableCaption" : true, "imageCountInRow" : 3.0, "optionHeight" : 100.0, "optionWidth" : 100.0, "hide" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "accessibleInFutureSteps" : false, "conditionType" : "Hide if False", "controllingField" : { "source" : "", "type" : "", "element" : "" }, "optionSource" : { "source" : "", "type" : "" }, "options" : [ { "value" : "Yes", "name" : "Yes" }, { "value" : "No", "name" : "No" } ], "helpText" : "", "help" : false, "horizontalMode" : true, "readOnly" : false, "repeatClone" : false, "repeat" : false, "required" : false, "label" : "Does the child you are supporting require intensive care and constant monitoring on a 24-hr basis?", "controlWidth" : 12.0 }

childElements.name: OntarioResident
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "controlWidth" : 12.0, "label" : "Are you a resident of Ontario?", "required" : false, "repeat" : false, "repeatClone" : false, "readOnly" : false, "horizontalMode" : true, "help" : false, "helpText" : "", "options" : [ { "name" : "Yes", "value" : "Yes" }, { "name" : "No", "value" : "No" } ], "optionSource" : { "type" : "", "source" : "" }, "controllingField" : { "element" : "", "type" : "", "source" : "" }, "conditionType" : "Hide if False", "accessibleInFutureSteps" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "hide" : false, "optionWidth" : 100.0, "optionHeight" : 100.0, "imageCountInRow" : 3.0, "enableCaption" : true, "disOnTplt" : false }

childElements.name: PassesScreening
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "label" : "Passes Screening", "controlWidth" : 12.0, "expression" : "IF(
((%OntarioResident% <> 'Yes')||
(%Under18% <> 'Yes')||
(%HaveDisability% <> 'Yes')||
(%IntensiveCare% <> 'Yes'))
,
"No",
"Yes"
)", "hide" : true, "hideGroupSep" : false, "currencySymbol" : "$", "dateFormat" : "MM-dd-yyyy" }
